props.name: popup
props.description: Defines if menu would displayed as a popup.

props.name: breakpoint
props.description: The breakpoint to define the maximum width boundary.

props.name: appendTo
props.description: A valid query selector or an HTMLElement to specify where the overlay gets attached.

props.name: baseZIndex
props.description: Base zIndex value to use in layering.

props.name: disabled
props.description: When present, it specifies that the component should be disabled.

props.name: tabindex
props.description: Index of the element in tabbing order.

props.name: ariaLabel
props.description: Defines a string value that labels an interactive element.

props.name: ariaLabelledby
props.description: Identifier of the underlying menu element.

props.name: dt
props.description: It generates scoped CSS variables using design tokens for the component.

props.name: pt
props.description: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

props.name: ptOptions
props.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

props.name: unstyled
props.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

parameters.name: scope
scope
scope

emits.name: focus
emits.description: Callback to invoke when the component receives focus.

emits.name: blur
emits.description: Callback to invoke when the component loses focus.

emits.name: before-show
emits.description: Callback to invoke before the popup is shown.

emits.name: before-hide
emits.description: Callback to invoke before the popup is hidden.

emits.name: show
emits.description: Callback to invoke when the popup is shown.

emits.name: hide
emits.description: Callback to invoke when the popup is hidden.
